mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "user" (email, username, password, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{username}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE "user" SET email = #{user.email}, username = #{user.username}, password = #{user.password}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT role.name AS role_name FROM role JOIN user_role ON user_role.role_id = role.id WHERE user_role.user_id = #{id};
